Title: How to Read Donald Duck
Notes: Banned in Pinochet's Chile. The Chilean army publicly burned copies of the book.

Title: Clandestine in Chile
Notes: Banned in Pinochet's Chile. On November 28, 1986, the Chilean customs authorities seized almost 15,000 copies of Clandestine in Chile, which were later burned by military authorities in Valparaíso.
